metadata.title: CVE-2020-36244 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
The daemon in GENIVI diagnostic log and trace (DLT), is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow that could allow an attacker to remotely execute arbitrary code on the DLT-Daemon (versions prior to 2.18.6).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-36244` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dlt-daemon - 2.18.6-1
dlt-tools - 2.18.6-1
libdlt-examples - 2.18.6-1
libdlt2 - 2.18.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dlt-daemon package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.18.6-1').
